result.reason: Multiple users requested per-connection hostname/IP switching and a maintainer already indicated a profile-based implementation path.
result.approach: Add an optional alternate address in connection profiles, expose it in Connect With Options, resolve the selected address at connect-time, and serialize it with backward compatibility.
